H0.text: what countries in the world speak chinese. Mandarin

H1.text: what countries in the world speak chinese. Wu

H2.text: what countries in the world speak chinese. Cantonese

H3.text: what countries in the world speak chinese. Shěn

A4.text: Standard Chinese is the standard language of China (where it is called 普通话; pǔtōnghuà) and Taiwan, and one of the four official languages of Singapore (where it is called either 华语; 華語; Huáyǔ or 汉语; 漢語; Hànyǔ).

A5.text: Cantonese is the dominant language in Hong Kong and Macau.

A6.text: In northern Myanmar, a Southwestern Mandarin variant is spoken by local Chinese and other ethnic groups.

A7.text: The Dungan people of Kyrgyzstan, Kazakhstan and Uzbekistan speak a variant of Mandarin.
